summary: The document is a forensic analysis report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory regarding a Glock 17 pistol and associated evidence. The pistol was test fired, and a cartridge case was entered into the NIBIN, resulting in a possible investigative lead linking two cases. The lead is unconfirmed and requires further microscopic comparison for confirmation.
conclusion: A NIBIN investigative lead was developed linking this case with another, but confirmation requires further evidence submission for microscopic comparison.

events.details: The Glock 17 pistol was test fired and a cartridge case was entered into NIBIN, resulting in a possible investigative lead.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19mm caliber (S/N: obliterated)
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
Laboratory test cartridge case fired by Item BCSO-3 (Glock 17 pistol)
Stray bronze and silver in color 9mm unfired cartridges with Luger headstamp
